record.title: LEGISLATIVE SESSION
record.chair: The Senate will now return to legislative session.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak as in morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Ms. Murkowski pertaining to the introduction of S. 896 are printed in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I yield the floor, and I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
